name: UnderParty
description:
UnderParty is an Action Platformer (Ryona) game.
Use your flamboyant controls to get them out of the enemy's strongholds safely

※ Story


※ Warning

  • There's a lot of violent Gore (Ryona) production.
  • Very difficult.

※ Features

  • 16 achievements
  • Seven distinctive stages.
  • Various Motion Events
  • Various Boss Patterns
